description:
Here's the introductory course to product sourcing from China factories that you're looking for as I take you along on my recent visit to 2 Hong Kong trade shows. It's like you were tagging along side me as I travel to Hong Kong, walk the show floors and negotiate directly with Chinese factories.

This is the perfect course for eCommerce, Amazon or eBay sellers looking to find private label or wholesale product sources and are ready to go that extra step attending a product trade show meeting Chinese factories face to face and negotiating winning deals that will accelerate your profits.

Learn from real-life examples that I explain in deep detail, show floor videos like you're actually there and many lessons learned BIG and SMALL after sourcing directly from China factories for over a decade.
title: Private Label Product Sourcing from CHINA Introduction
